name: LifeGo
description:
LifeGo is a short game where you start as a baby and eventually grow to an old man. This game includes platform and maze levels, weapons, and upgraded items each level. By the end of the game, your score is showed. Have fun!

-This game is free for download (Windows)

Credits:

Story: Julienne Obligar

Credit to owners of the artwork used

SFX: freesound.org

Music:  freesound.org, youtube.com
